entries.complete: Thank you! I would have been toast without you.
entries.failed_destroy: You have failed, return to base.
entries.panic_1: I don't know how much more she can take!
entries.quest_dock_d: You need to dock with the freighter to help with repairs.
entries.quest_location_d: Region of Ord Mantell space where Nova Orion Industries is located.
entries.quest_update: Thanks for the escort pilot, we can take it from here.
entries.recovery_success: Thank you, we can take it from here.
entries.rescue_phase_1: Thank you, we were attacked and left here to die!
entries.rescue_phase_2: All repairs have been made, lets get out of here.
entries.title: Springing the Trap
entries.title_d: One of Nova's ships was disabled. It is most likely a trap. You need to repair it and get it back to the station.
